thread.section_title: San Carlos Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel; great service
thread.title_full: Good hotel; great service - Review of San Carlos Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ben S
title: Good hotel; great service
text: You don't think of New York hotels for warm, outgoing service or big rooms, but the San Carlos Hotel has both. We were initially given a 2-queen room, which was large but had no view at all. The person at the front desk kindly upgraded us for free to a junior suite. Our 6-year-old loved the magic penny trick performed for her by Gabriel at the front desk the next day. While the rooms were styled a bit less luxuriously than one might expect for a 4+ star hotel and the breakfast, while free, was only adequate, overall we had an excellent stay.
